text:
@realDonaldTrump 1/2
Deep State didn’t concede 2016 election result & was trying to take down Trump from January 2017. 

But some in Trump Team were thinking, “Game Over”. Flynn was one of them.

It was just the beginning, looking at
- Mueller Investigation 
- Impeachment
- ongoing CoronaVirus.
